entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: SW 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
